channel.title: Making special bar refil after Logged out and in
channel.description: Seeing waiting for your specail bar to refil, i was wondering how can i make it refil after someone has logged out and in, instead waitin for like 4 Minutes for your special bar?

item.title: Making special bar refil after Logged out and in
item.dc:creator: @burnt_w_pwnt burnt w pwnt
item.description:
@burnt_w_pwnt wrote:

[quote=“raped by who, post:2, topic:298853”]initialize method

could add liek
specialAmount = 100;

or…
if(specialAmount < 100){
specialAmount += 25;
}

.>[/quote]
you are a life saver

Read full topic
item.source: Making special bar refil after Logged out and in
